div.h2: Success For Every Student. Every Day.
div.h1: Tuition Free Public School in Tucson

div.class: intro-block__content large-8 large-offset-1 medium-8 small-12 cell

p.strong: Edge is an AdvancED accredited, tuition free, charter high school, with 2 campuses in the greater Tucson area. Students can choose morning or afternoon schedules to best fit their needs.

div.p: Edge offers both text and web based curriculum to meet the needs of students with diverse learning styles.

Edge students enjoy small class sizes with a high level of individualized instruction. Students at Edge focus on three academic classes at a time and receive instruction from Highly Qualified and certified teachers.
A school is meant to give attendees a safe place to fulfill their dreams. Here are some of the ways Edge High School helps to provide that tool for all students, no matter their life journey.

div.class: large-3 medium-12 small-12 cell column-container__first first-column

div.p: A school is meant to give attendees a safe place to fulfill their dreams. Here are some of the ways Edge High School helps to provide that tool for all students, no matter their life journey.

div.class: large-9 medium-12 small-12 cell column-container__second icon-list
large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item1

div.p: Do you have a plan to graduate? Making a plan for graduation and life after graduation will help you reach your goals. Your plan can get you back on track or help you accelerate your learning so you can graduate early! Each student’s plan is unique to support both their present and future goals.

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item2

p.span: Are you behind in credits? Not to worry…we will meet you where you are at! Edge High School’s self-paced instructional model allows you the opportunity to recover credit. At Edge you take only 3 classes at a time, allowing you to focus and accomplish more than in a traditional school year! Most students are able to complete courses in 2-3 months.

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item3

p.span: What makes your learning about YOU? In Edge’s learning environment you have the opportunity to work with your teachers to individualize your lessons and assignments to blend grade level requirements with your real life interests. Your teachers are there to support you, meeting with you one-on-one to build your skills and help you stay on pace to achieve success in each class.

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item4

p.span: Do you have a job and/or other responsibilities that make attending school difficult? Edge High School offers a 4 hour and 30 minute school day with both morning and afternoon sessions available for you to choose from. Attend school while still having time for other responsibilities!

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item5

p.span: Ever feel lost in a classroom of 35 students or in a school of 1500? Edge High School believes in the small school environment to provide greater one-on-one support to students. Our class sizes are capped at 22 students per class. Edge’s High School’s Himmel Park campus serves up to 180 students while Edge’s Northwest campus serves up to 75 students. Be part of a school community where everyone knows your name!

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item6

p.span: Life is complicated, right? Meeting your educational goals while balancing your life commitments and challenges of family, friends, work and more can be difficult for anyone. At Edge we have licensed clinical social workers who can support you in learning life skills to manage stress and connect you to resources to make every day better.

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item7

p.span: Do you want to graduate early or get ahead? In Edge’s self-paced model you focus on three core academic classes at a time allowing you to complete those courses which are normally a semester long in almost
the time. As soon as you complete a course you are able to start the next in your learning plan and move ahead without waiting for a new quarter or semester to get started.

div.class: large-4 medium-4 small-6 cell icon-list__item item8

p.span: Which location is right for you? The Edge Himmel Park campus is located at Speedway and Tucson, directly on major bus routes and just one mile east of The University of Arizona. The Edge Northwest campus is located at Oracle and Ina providing easy access from Oro Valley, Catalina, Marana, Catalina Foothills, and North Tucson. Both campuses offer the same academic courses with electives rotating between outside agency partnerships. Both campuses offer 30-day economy fare bus transportation for students who have the Sun Go ID&Card.

div.iframe: This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.
div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function($){gformInitSpinner( 1, 'https://www.edgehighschool.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery('#gform_ajax_frame_1').on('load',function(){var contents = jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_1');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_1').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;var mt = parseInt(jQuery('html').css('margin-top'), 10) + parseInt(jQuery('body').css('margin-top'), 10) + 100;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').offset().top - mt); }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_1').val();gformInitSpinner( 1, 'https://www.edgehighschool.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [1, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_1'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gf_1').offset().top - mt);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [1]);window['gf_submitting_1'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_1').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [1, current_page]);} );} );
